name: !Dead Pixels Adventure!
description:
Dead Pixels Adventure! - A unique retro game with elements of parkour, action and adventure. Go to the creepy 2D dungeon, filled with skeletons and evil spirits! Can you reach the end and defeat the terrible flying ship !?

Features:
* 10 Diverse levels of varying complexity
* 6 Kinds of weapons
* Elements of parkour and labyrinth
* 2 View of mobs
* A frightening boss at the end of the game
* Unique in its kind minimalistic graphics
*Low price
*5.000 Achievements
*Skins
* Eerie traps! Deadly turrets, sharp saws and much more!

Credits :
Dev : Minepostol
Music by : Track: Au5 - Closer (feat. Danyka Nadeau) [NCS Release]
Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds.
Watch: https://youtu.be/B-Jj017-2pQ
Free Download / Stream: http://ncs.io/CloserYO


TUTORIAL
